articles.author: Andre Janse Van Vuuren
articles.title: Japanese Stocks Rally, Bond Sale Sees Solid Demand: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Stocks in Europe and Asia set the pace on Thursday, while US futures held gains as traders bet that Federal Reserve rate cuts will help drive a global rally into year-end.
articles.content:
Stocks in Europe and Asia set the pace on Thursday, while US futures held gains as traders bet that Federal Reserve rate cuts will help drive a global rally into year-end.
